name: Anonychat
tagline: Chat with anyone, anywhere, about anything.
body: My buddy @smmullen90 and I love chatting. So, we thought, why not bring it to the online world? (A totally novel concept...) Anonychat features forums that span a variety of topics, interesting users, and the ability to post anonymously.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
